description: An interactive view of your energy consumption, production, and environment.

targets.query: SELECT mean("site_instant_power") AS "grid" FROM "http" WHERE ("url" = 'https://teslapw/api/meters/aggregates') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("main_temp") *1.8+32 FROM "weather" WHERE  coord_lat = 47.6838 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("battery_instant_power") FROM "http" WHERE ("url" = 'https://teslapw/api/meters/aggregates' AND "battery_instant_power" > 0) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) fill(none)
SELECT mean("solar_instant_power") AS "solar" FROM "http" WHERE ("url" = 'https://teslapw/api/meters/aggregates') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) fill(none)
SELECT count("battery_instant_power") FROM "http" WHERE ("url" = 'https://teslapw/api/meters/aggregates' AND "battery_instant_power" > 0) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(none)
SELECT count("battery_instant_power") FROM "http" WHERE ("url" = 'https://teslapw/api/meters/aggregates' AND "battery_instant_power" < 0) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0)

title: Powerwall History
